title: Broadway Macau kick-starts its first Mid-Autumn Festival
text:
Broadway Macau kick-starts its first Mid-Autumn Festival   
Sep 16, 2015   
HONG KONG and MACAU ─ Broadway Macau, a new first-to-Macau landmark destination featuring authentic food, friendly service and up-close-and-personal entertainment, has kick-started its first Mid-Autumn Festival! 
Since festivities launch on 12 September, Broadway Macau has been all-aglow with radiant lanterns and laughter – and there are heaps of prizes and carnival fun still to come. 
During Broadway Macau’s Mid-Autumn Carnival, spend MOP100 anywhere on The Broadway, show your receipt and you’ll get to enter into the “Lantern Riddle” game. Guess the correct answer within designated duration and you could win Broadway souvenirs!, or come along to a DIY Lantern Decoration Workshop where kids and teens can show off their arts and craft skills and win prizes worth up to MOP1,000! Yet to come on 19, 26 and 27 September, it’s the Lantern Parade led by Broadway performers. The Broadway is famous for its boisterous parades, and the Lantern Parade – with free lanterns for guests so everyone can join – will be a bright addition to these autumnal festivities. 
The Broadway’s major Mid-Autumn Carnival event is on Friday, 25 September – the Full Moon Party! This dazzling and free event will have non-stop entertainment with a fun-filled lantern parade, live DJ and live music at Band on the Run. As for prizes, there will be more chances than ever to win! The first 300 guests to register online for the Full Moon Party will receive exclusive Party pack; and the first 300 guests register onsite will get a FREE lucky-draw lantern for a chance at prizes worth up to MOP5, 000. 
The last day of the festive Mid-Autumn Carnival program at The Broadway is Sunday, 27 September, and while the luminous decorations (a must-snap seasonal photo op!) will be on display until Sunday, 4 October. For more information on the festive events and prizes to come, visit: http://www.broadwaymacau.com.mo/en/ 
Activity Time & Date 
Lantern Riddles 6pm – 10pm. 12th - 13th, 19th - 20th, 25th - 27th September 
DIY Lantern Decoration Workshops 4pm - 7pm. 12th - 13th, 19th - 20th, 25th - 27th September 
Lantern Parade 9:15pm - 9:30pm. 12th, 19th, 25th - 27th September Full Moon Party 9:30pm till late. 25th September
